user.title: My account
user.intro: Manage your local account, backups, and security settings.

userId.title: User ID
userId.desc: Your unique identifier on this device.

backup.title: Backup
backup.desc: Export your data to a file, store it somewhere safe, and use it later to restore your account on this device.

changePin.title: Change PIN
changePin.desc: Set a new PIN for this device.

resetKeys.title: Reset security keys
resetKeys.desc: Regenerates your keys and clears chat history.

delete.title: Delete user
delete.desc: Remove this user and all local data.
